text: Tell me again why anyone would want to be in an indoor arena for 2 hours with 19,000 sweaty, screaming people in order to celebrate a man with dementia whose ignorance and negligence is killing thousands upon thousands of Americans, while at the same time decimating the economy.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Entertainment Personality
domain.description: An entertainment personality in the world, like Anderson Cooper or Miranda Sings
